name: Dr. Narinder Dental Implant Center
location: Guru Vihar Chowk, Guru Vihar Rd, adjacent to HDFC ATM, Chander Lok Colony, Jodhewal, Ludhiana, Punjab 141007
notes:
Chain of clinics (DNDIC, GlowDent Spark, Mahi Dental Care). 
Instagram: @dr.narinderdentalimplantcenter (165 followers) 
Instagram: @narinderkumar.91 
Google Rating: 5.0 (16 reviews) 
Hours: Open ¬∑ Closes 10 pm 
Dr. Narinder Kumar is the Head and Chairperson.

---
üõë **BUSINESS MODEL DEEP DIVE (Hub-and-Spoke Strategy)**

1. **The Structure: Family-Owned Group Practice**
   - This is a "Mini-Chain" enterprise run by the "Power Couple": **Dr. Narinder Kumar** (The "Face" & Chairperson) and **Dr. Rupinder Kaur Mahi** (The Specialist Operator).
   - They don't run one massive hospital; they use a **Multi-Location Strategy** to capture the entire Ludhiana market (North, West, and East).

2. **The Role of THIS Clinic (DNDIC - Basti Jodhewal)**
   - **The Flagship / Surgical Hub.**
   - Located in a dense, high-traffic area. The name "Implant Center" signals high-ticket surgical authority.
   - This is where the heavy lifting (implants, complex surgeries) likely happens.

3. **The Marketing Engine**
   - **Personal Branding:** Dr. Narinder is building himself as a thought leader (Podcasts on "The Sukh Talks", Educational Reels).
   - **Content Machine:** They actively create video content to build trust *before* the patient walks in.

4. üéØ **SALES ANGLE (The Pitch)**
   - **The Pain Point:** They have 3 distinct brands but a fragmented digital presence. Their current website (Google Sites) looks like a small single clinic, not the "Corporate Group" they actually are.
   - **The Solution:** Pitch a **"Unified Digital HQ"**. A premium website that showcases the entire *Group* but allows patients to book at this specific flagship branch.
   - **High-Ticket Conversion:** Since this is the *Implant* hub, the CRM is vital to ensure high-value leads from Instagram don't get lost in DMs.

name: GlowDent Spark Dental Clinic
doctorName: Dr. Narinder Kumar, Dr. Rupinder Kaur Mahi
location: Haibowal Dairy Complex, Main Hambran Rd, near Fire Station, opp. Doaba Sweets, New Kitchlu Nagar, Ludhiana, Punjab 141001
notes:
Branch of DNDIC chain. 
Instagram: @glowdentsparkdentalclinic (72 followers) 
Google Rating: 5.0 (4 reviews) 
Hours: Closes 7 pm

---
üõë **BUSINESS MODEL DEEP DIVE (The Boutique Branch)**

1. **The Role: Aesthetic & Comfort Center**
   - **Vibe:** "Glow" and "Spark" suggest a focus on **Cosmetic Dentistry (Smile Design, Veneers)**.
   - **Location Strategy:** Located on Hambran Road (New Kitchlu Nagar), a more upscale area. This branch targets premium clients/HNIs looking for "comfort" and "beauty" rather than just surgical utility.

2. **Differentiation**
   - Unlike the main surgical hub, this clinic sells *lifestyle* and *confidence*. The branding is softer and more modern.

3. **Network Effect**
   - It creates a "Cross-Pollination" effect. If a patient follows Dr. Narinder but wants a cosmetic makeover in a posh setting, they are funneled here.

4. üéØ **SALES ANGLE (The Pitch)**
   - **Visual Selling:** This clinic needs a website section heavily focused on **Before/After Smile Makeovers**.
   - **The "Luxury" Pitch:** "Doctor, this branch is your 'premium showroom'. Your website needs to reflect that high-end vibe so patients don't hesitate to pay premium prices for veneers/aligners here."

location: Shop No. 09 & 10, Garcha Market, Kohara Macchiwara Link Rd, Main, Kohara Chowk, Kohara, Punjab 141112
notes:
Branch of DNDIC chain. 
Instagram: @mahidentalcare (98 followers) 
Instagram: @doc_mahi 
Google Rating: 5.0 (1 review) 
Hours: 9 am - 6 pm 
Dr. Rupinder Kaur Mahi is a certified implantologist.

---
üõë **BUSINESS MODEL DEEP DIVE (The Suburban Capture)**

1. **The Role: The Geographic "Catchment"**
   - **Location:** Kohara (Outskirts/Suburbs).
   - **Operator:** Run by **Dr. Rupinder Kaur Mahi** (Certified Implantologist).
   - **Strategy:** Captures the semi-urban/rural patient base. It prevents patients in the outskirts from needing to travel all the way to the city center (or going to a competitor).

2. **Operational Efficiency**
   - Dr. Rupinder acts as the specialist anchor here. It allows the group to service a completely different demographic without diluting the "City Brand" of the other two clinics.

3. üéØ **SALES ANGLE (The Pitch)**
   - **Integration:** "Dr. Narinder, you have patients in Kohara who might see your Reels but think you are too far away. We need to make it crystal clear on your website that 'Mahi Dental Care' is YOUR trusted branch nearby."
   - **Lead Routing:** Use the CRM to automatically route leads from this area to this specific clinic's WhatsApp.

name: Guru Nanak Dental Clinic
location: Shop no. 5, East Mohan Nagar Market, near Gupta Bakery, Mohan Nagar, Amritsar, Punjab 143006
notes:
Facebook: @gurunanakdentalclinic (74 followers)
Google Rating: 4.4 (19 reviews)
Hours: Open ¬∑ Closes 8:30 pm

---
üõë **BUSINESS MODEL DEEP DIVE (The Neighborhood Authority)**

1. **The Structure: Single-Owner Private Practice**
   - Run by **Dr. Dalip Singh**. This is a classic "Doctor-Entrepreneur" model where the brand is tied directly to the owner's reputation in the community.

2. **Location Strategy: Hyper-Local Market Hub**
   - Located in **East Mohan Nagar Market**. This is a high-density residential and commercial pocket.
   - **Strategy:** Convenience and Trust. They capture the "walk-in" and "local referral" traffic. If you live in Mohan Nagar, this is *your* dentist.

3. **Operational Vibe: The "All-Rounder"**
   - **Positioning:** "SPECIALIZED FOR EVERY DENTAL TREATMENT".
   - They are not niche; they are the **One-Stop Shop** for the entire family. From kids' fillings to grandpa's dentures (and implants). Volume-based but aiming for retention.

4. **Marketing Engine: Digital Sleeper**
   - **Current State:** Weak digital footprint (74 FB likes).
   - **Reliance:** Likely 90% Word-of-Mouth and Market Visibility (Signage).
   - **Risk:** They are vulnerable to new, digitally-savvy clinics poaching their younger/high-ticket patients.

5. **üéØ SALES ANGLE (The Pitch)**
   - **The "Service Menu" Problem:** "Dr. Dalip, you do *everything* (Implants, Perio, etc.), but online you just look like a general clinic. We need a website that creates specific pages for your High-Ticket services."
   - **The "Neighborhood Dominance" Pitch:** "You own the physical market in Mohan Nagar. Let's own the *Google Search* for 'Dentist in Mohan Nagar' too, so no one bypasses you."

chains.description: Messages BEFORE you share a preview (to pre-sell value)

templates.title: 1Ô∏è‚É£ Warm Opener (No Preview Yet)
templates.content:
Hi Dr. Dalip Singh, I'm Kulkaran.
I help premium dental clinics in Amritsar increase implant/aligner enquiries using a modern, mobile-first website.

I checked Guru Nanak Dental Clinic online ‚Äî you're offering implants and periodontics, but your online presence isn't showing that premium trust.

Can I show you a quick 10-second homepage preview?

templates.title: 2Ô∏è‚É£ If They Say 'We Don't Need Website'
templates.condition: They say it's going fine without website
templates.content:
Totally fair doctor ‚Äî many clinics feel that way.

The only reason I reached out is because high-ticket services like implants and periodontics usually convert better when patients see:
‚Ä¢ before/after results
‚Ä¢ clear treatment trust
‚Ä¢ WhatsApp booking
‚Ä¢ premium clinic branding

If you're open, I'll share a small preview so you can see the difference.

templates.title: 1Ô∏è‚É£ Preview Delivery Message
templates.content:
Dr. Dalip Singh, I made a modern homepage preview for Guru Nanak Dental Clinic.
It's designed to build instant trust for high-ticket cases like implants and periodontics.

Here's the sample üëá
{{preview_link_or_text}}

templates.title: 2Ô∏è‚É£ Micro-Commitment Question
templates.content:
Should I expand this into a full homepage mockup for you?
I'll show 2 styles so you can pick what matches your clinic.

templates.title: 3Ô∏è‚É£ Value Follow-Up (2 Hours)
templates.content:
Just checking doctor ‚Äî did you get a chance to see it?
If you like the direction, I can also design a dedicated implants and periodontics page that converts more enquiries.

templates.title: 4Ô∏è‚É£ Next Morning Nudge
templates.content:
Good morning Dr. Dalip Singh üôÇ
Quick yes/no ‚Äî should I keep working on your homepage mockup, or pause it for now?

templates.title: 5Ô∏è‚É£ Soft Close (Day 3)
templates.content:
Doctor, I'm closing showroom previews today to focus on active projects.
Should I keep Guru Nanak Dental Clinic's preview on hold if you plan to upgrade this month?
